title: Dr. Aswath Damodaran Talks Valuation, Market Uncertainty, and Bitcoin

media:group.media:title: Dr. Aswath Damodaran Talks Valuation, Market Uncertainty, and Bitcoin
media:group.media:description:
Dr. Damodaran's channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/AswathDamodaranonValuation
Dr. Damodaran's Website: https://pages.stern.nyu.edu/~adamodar/
Dr. Damodaran's blog: https://aswathdamodaran.blogspot.com/

This video is available as a podcast at www.theplainbagel.com and on Apple Podcasts (search "The Plain Podcast")!

00:00 - Introduction
02:36 - Why Aswath Teaches 
06:27 - Valuation vs Pricing
16:36 - What Swath Looks For in a Company
19:11 - Common Analysis Mistakes
23:46 - The Changing Valuation Environment
32:02 - Aswath's Views on Crypto
42:49 - Closing Tips

I had the chance to sit down with the "Dean of Valuation" himself, Dr. Damodaran of NYU Stern, who offered is views on valuation, the current market environment, and bitcoin.

If you'd like to support the channel, you can do so at https://www.patreon.com/ThePlainBagel :)

DISCLAIMER:
This channel is for education purposes only and does not constitute financial advice - Richard is not responsible for investment actions taken by viewers. Please seek out a registered advisor if you require assistance (while Richard is a registered portfolio manager at WDS Investment Management, he does not provide advice through The Plain Bagel, which is not affiliated with his employer).
